events.name: CampaignCreated
events.description: The event when a new marketing campaign is initiated.

events.name: CampaignLaunched
events.description: Triggered when a marketing campaign is officially launched.

events.name: CampaignEnded
events.description: Indicates the conclusion of a marketing campaign.

events.name: LeadGenerated
events.description: Occurs when a new lead is acquired through marketing efforts.

events.name: LeadNurtured
events.description: Triggered when a lead is actively engaged and nurtured through marketing activities.

events.name: MarketingMaterialReviewed
events.description: When marketing materials are reviewed for campaigns.

events.name: MarketingBudgetAllocated
events.description: Indicates the event where marketing budgets are allocated to campaigns.

events.name: MarketResearchConducted
events.description: Triggered when market research is conducted to inform marketing strategies.

commands.name: CreateCampaign
commands.description: The event when a new marketing campaign is initiated.

commands.name: LaunchCampaign
commands.description: Triggered when a marketing campaign is officially launched.

commands.name: EndCampaign
commands.description: Indicates the conclusion of a marketing campaign.

commands.name: GenerateLead
commands.description: Occurs when a new lead is acquired through marketing efforts.

commands.name: NurtureLead
commands.description: Triggered when a lead is actively engaged and nurtured through marketing activities.

commands.name: ReviewMarketingMaterial
commands.description: When marketing materials are reviewed for campaigns.

commands.name: AllocateBudget
commands.description: Indicates the event where marketing budgets are allocated to campaigns.

commands.name: ConductMarketResearch
commands.description: Triggered when market research is conducted to inform marketing strategies.

integrationPoints.name: Sales
integrationPoints.description: Integration with sales to track conversion of leads generated from campaigns.

integrationPoints.name: Analytics
integrationPoints.description: Integration with analytics for tracking campaign performance metrics.
